DataElement.preferredName: Smoking Partner Interaction Questionnaire Assessment Score
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The act of puffing and/or inhaling smoke from a lit cigarette, cigar, or pipe._A 20-item questionnaire to assess social support provided by a spouse or partner for adults wanting to stop smoking. It includes two subscales for assessing positive and negative behaviors of the partner._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ReferenceDocuments.name: The Partner Interaction Quest
ReferenceDocuments.description: The Partner Interaction Questionnaire is a 20-item questionnaire to assess the nature of partner behaviors supporting quitting and maintenance of abstinence. It includes two subscales assessing positive and negative behaviors provided by a spouse or romantic partner, close friend, or family member.
